Posts.Content: Oct 21, 2005 01:51AM Sem wrote: Hope your treatment is going well and you are doing well. Your post really caught my attention, because like you, I thought I was a very strong person. I am waiting to get my results back from my Oncotype test. I am scheduled to start chemo on Oct. 26 if that is what the test suggest. I have been crying all the time, mostly over the fear of the hair loss. I was wondering how the meds helped you with your nerves. I would perfer not to take any, but I cry over any little thing.
Posts.Title: 2005 ROCK-TOBER CHEMO GIRLS sherryhaire Curlylocks
